con:soapui-project.name: Deployments Test Cases
con:soapui-project.con:description: All of the Deployments test cases are included in this project. The clusterName has been removed from all requests and verification steps, due to user story RMINF-77: Modify Deployments Maintenance

con:config.script: log.info " :: Test Case * " + testRunner.testCase.name + " * has been executed with no errors :: "

con:restRequest.name: TryUpdateDeploymentThatDoesntExist
con:restRequest.con:request: { "applicationKey": "ANA_APP1", "description": "Trying to update a deployment that does not exist.", "enabled": true, "key": ${#TestCase#key_req}, "version": "1.0.0" }

con:testCase.name: TC1061_VerifySortingAndPagingDeploymentsList
con:testCase.con:description: T-1061:Deployments sorting with different size of pages

con:config.script:
int currentPageNumber = Integer.parseInt(testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("currentPageNumber")) + 1
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("currentPageNumber", Integer.toString(currentPageNumber))
log.info " Current Page Number: " + currentPageNumber
